results.event_name: Papua New Guinea: Landslide/Wet mass movement - 01/01/2012
Ghor, badakhastan, hiratn, kundus, parwan floods and landslides
Rise in the level of parana and iguazu rivers due to heavy rains
Thakurgaon, gaibandha, dinajpur panchagarh, nilphamari, lalmoirhat, kurigram, jamalpur and sirajgonj july floods
Erosion following floods in kurigram district
